mcq.statement: A 30 year old women is admitted to ICU with severe pneumonia Thyroid function tests suggests the presence of a sick Euthyroid state. Which of the following is the most likely finding?

options.a: Low T3, Low T4 and Low TSH
options.c: Low T3, Low T4 and High TSH
options.d: High T3, High T4 and Low TSH
